---------------
F-Com Terminal
---------------

Since the company was founded in 2011, we have been developing and using our own customer portal. Our vision is to create a place where you can handle all your needs conveniently and easily.We love the advantage that we can simply develop and implement new functions ourselves instead of relying on third parties.

LEARN MORE

---------------
HARDWARE
---------------

There is nothing more annoying than unreliable services or downtimes. As one of our main goal is to provide rock solid services and avoid downtimes and issues at all costs, all of our systems are based on thoroughly tested components with the highest reliability.

LEARN MORE

---------------------
NOT A RESELLER
---------------------

To provide best services and availability we own and operate all of our Servers, Switching and Routing equipment. In case of problems our office is located 5 minutes away from our colocation, so that we can guarantee fastest response times.

LEARN MORE

------------------
AVAILABILITY
------------------

As we know that our customers rely on our services we guarantee 99.9% availability throughout the year.

LEARN MORE

TESTIMONIALS / FEEDBACK FROM OTHER CUSTOMERS

SEE MORE

--------------------------------------------------
CONTRACT DETAILS. SIMPLE AND FAIR.
--------------------------------------------------

Choose out of 4 contract models within the configuration process. These contract models are currently available:

1. Contract model: 1 month - 0% lifetime discount
2. Contract model: 3 months - 2% lifetime discount
3. Contract model: 6 months - 4% lifetime discount
4. Contract model: 12 months - 10% lifetime discount

You can also turn subscription off, so that the contract will be terminated automatically after the contract period ends.

---------------
NETWORK
---------------

All VPS are provided with one dedicated IPv4 address and one dedicated /64 IPv6 network.
We offer free BGP Sessions (IPv4 and IPv6) for all KVM Power Edition VPS.

---------------
INTERNAL NETWORK
---------------

Get two or more VPS and create private interconnections between them for free.

---------------
14 DAY MONEY-BACK-GUARANTEE
---------------

First Root is offering a 14 days Money-Back-Guarantee for new customers.

--------------------------
PAYMENT METHODS
--------------------------

Our options for your payment.

- Wire transfer / bank transfer
- SEPA direct debit (for EU customers)
- PayPal
- Creditcard (VISA, Mastercard, American Express)
- Bitcoin *NEW*

All Payment methods are free of charge, we charge no creditcard fees!
